Activity: Start the day by checking emails and responding to urgent requests. Review the progress on the previous goals.
Follow up with @comp-1 and @legal-1 regarding the review of the marketing materials. Request any final feedback and make necessary revisions.
Once the marketing materials are approved by @comp-1 and @legal-1, finalize the production and distribution plans.
Coordinate with the graphic designer to finalize the brochure and video production. Ensure that the materials are high-quality and meet all regulatory requirements.
Work with @ir-1 to implement the outreach strategy for UHNWI prospects. Monitor the results of the outreach efforts and make adjustments as needed.
Lunch break. Have a celebratory lunch with the team to celebrate the progress made this week.
Prepare a report summarizing the progress made on all four goals this week. Highlight key achievements, challenges, and lessons learned.
Present the report to the team and solicit feedback. Use the feedback to improve the marketing and communication strategy for the fund.
Plan for the upcoming week's activities based on results obtained so far. Set clear goals and deadlines.
Final review of the week's work. Send out any last emails or communication. Tidy up the desk. Enjoy the weekend.
